name: indoctrination (C64)
description:
indoctrination. (C64) Commodore 64

the new rage. a new mini-game for the Commie 64.

Ever wonder what it's like living in a socialist or communist society.  Here's a look from experience ported to contemporary and dystopian future context via a short micro-game and TRUE/FALSE test, whereby you will granted or revoked permissions in daily life and ranked on a social credit score.

Freedom, Liberty, Privacy and Freedom-of-Speech are the foundation of a democratic and free society as every period of time and culture in history has proven time-and-time again..
